findings.title: Wrong distributeDividends
findings.description: The function distributeXRPDividends(uint256 amount) has public access modifier, allowing anyone to call this function with any amount and put at risk part of the contract logic.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees and may abort with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.
